blocks.heading: Level Up Your Entire Company in One AI Workshop
blocks.description: Our tailored AI workshop empowers your entire company to use generative AI. Practical skills, no jargon, real results.

features.heading: No Cookie-Cutter Training
features.description: We customize the workshop to your industry and team's needs. Get AI strategies that actually work for your business

features.heading: Learn by Doing, Not Just Listening
features.description: Hands-on exercises with real AI tools. Build practical skills you can use on day one. No boring lectures, we promise

buttons.buttonText: Get Your Free AI Cheat Sheet

cards.heading: Get Ahead of AI
cards.description: 2 in 3 companies are already using AI tools. Don't get left behind - learn how to use AI better than your competition.

features.heading: Competitive Advantage
features.description: Turn AI from buzzwords into real results your team can use today

features.heading: Measurable ROI
features.description: See measurable productivity gains within weeks, not months

cards.heading: Real-World Impact
cards.description: No boring slides. Get hands-on with AI tools you'll actually use. Work on real tasks that matter to your team.

features.heading: Learn by Doing
features.description: Try out AI tools on your actual work problems, not made-up examples

features.heading: Master In-Demand Tools
features.description: Walk away with new skills you can use right away

cards.heading: AI for Everyone
cards.description: Every team can work smarter with AI. We'll show your whole company how to use AI tools that make their jobs easier.

features.heading: Company-Wide Upskilling
features.description: Training that fits each team's needs - from marketing to HR

features.heading: Tailored to You
features.description: Get your whole company excited about using AI in their daily work
